page.title: 14WHERE PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED
page.content: Apart from villages and hamlets most of the area is devoted to farmland. There are about a dozen farms of differing sizes part of whose land is included in this area. The majority of the land which isn't woodland is used for growing crops or keeping cows. There are very few sheep here now. Few of the farms employ more then one other person to work on them. They are mostly family owned and worked. Three of the farms are rented. Other employment directly in the area includes those who are self-employed. Many of them are in the building trade like bricklayers, plumbers, carpenters etc.A few work locally in pubs and shops. Most people who are in employment in the area travel to the nearby towns for their work. The area contains a higher than average retired population.
